title: If Torchwood ave is being completed, does this mean that the proposed connector from Military Cutoff along Mass Ave to the I140 bypass is no longer possible, or probable?
text:
There has been no decision on that proposal, and it's not moving
forward just yet. But we will be following the story and will update
readers on StarNews and StarNewsOnline.com if there's any movement or
new information to report.
